name: Pensel GA-90
description: PENSEL GA-90 is a glycerol rosin ester. PENSEL GA-90 is based on Chinese Gum Rosin and produced by Guangxi Wuzhou Arakawa- China. PENSEL GA-90 resin can be used in various adhesive applications and with a variety of elastomers. PENSEL GA-90 gives excellent performance in adhesion and provides heat stability to the end use applications. PENSEL GA-90 is especially engineered to provide these properties with EVA.
